title.native: 銀河英雄伝説 -Die Neue These- 邂逅
title.romaji: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Die Neue These - Kaikou
title.english: Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These

description: In humanity's distant future, two interstellar states—the monarchic Galactic Empire and the democratic Free Planets Alliance—are embroiled in a never-ending war. The story focuses on the exploits of rivals Reinhard von Müsel and Yang Wen Li as they rise to power and fame in the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance.
synonyms: Legend of the Galactic Heroes: The New Thesis - Encounter
La Leyenda de los Héroes de la Galaxia: La Nueva Tesis
Легенда о героях галактики: Новый тезис. Встреча

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Space Opera
tags.description: Centers around space warfare, advanced technology, chivalric romance and adventure.

tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description:
Novelist. Not to be confused with [Yoshiki Tanaka (田中克樹)](https://anilist.co/staff/117267).

Yoshiki Tanaka was born in 1952 in Kumamoto Prefecture and completed a doctorate in literature at Gakushuin University. Tanaka won the Gen’eijo (a mystery magazine) New Writer Award with his debut story “Midori no Sogen ni…” (On the green field…) in 1978, then started his carrier as a science fiction and fantasy writer. Legend of the Galactic Heroes, which translates the European wars of the nineteenth century to an interstellar setting, won the Seiun Award for best science fiction novel in 1987. Tanaka’s other works include the fantasy series The Heroic Legend of Arslan and many other science fiction, fantasy, historical, and mystery novels and stories
Started off as a production manager at Ad Cosmo.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choco_kiku) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/菊地洋子)

Married to [Eiji Suganuma](https://anilist.co/staff/109167/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [Youko Kikuchi (菊地陽子)](https://anilist.co/staff/141535/), different kanji._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1178607902522654720)

Originating from Ad Cosmo. Frequent presence in the [Gundam](https://anilist.co/anime/2581/) franchise since 2007.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/後藤隆幸)

Co-founder and representative director of [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). The studio is named after him and [Mitsuhisa Ishikawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103267/).

[Website](http://www.sawanohiroyuki.com/) | [Website (nZk)](http://www.sh-nzk.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sawano_nZk) | [Instagram (Official)](https://www.instagram.com/hiroyukisawano.official/) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/sawano__hiroyuki/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/SawanoHiroyukiSMEJ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Riv2KnFcLZA3JSVryRg4y?si=KaE_XDXqSRewfXXsxBNzoA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/hiroyuki-sawano/156620523) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/1315147) 

Composer and musician represented by VV-ALKLINE since 2017. He was previously with Legendoor from 2006 to 2017. 
Sawano began practicing the piano at an early age, and studied composition, arrangement, orchestration, and piano under Nobuchika Tsuboi from the age of 17.

Active as a composer since 2004, he first gained recognition for his work on the Team Medical Dragon TV drama in 2006. He made his debut as an anime composer in 2006 on [Soul Link](https://anilist.co/anime/854/). In 2009, he released his first solo album *musica*, which included some of his more popular songs done for TV shows. In 2014, he launched a new vocal song project under the name "SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]", producing the first album *UnChild* with [Aimer](https://anilist.co/staff/107859/) as the vocalist under the name SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]:Aimer. Since then his songs under this vocal song project have also been used as the opening and ending themes for various anime.

He has cited [Joe Hisaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/100738/), [Youko Kanno](https://anilist.co/staff/95508/), [Hans Zimmer](https://anilist.co/staff/104669/) and Danny Elfman as major inspirations.

Non-anime role:

• **Xenoblade Chronicles X (music)** 
• **Xenoblade Chronicles X Definitive Edition (music)**

__[Website](http://www.sin-web.jp/index.html) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/sin-net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sin_studiolife) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/SinStudio)__

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music

__Shin Hashimoto__, better known by stage name Sin, is a Japanese music producer, lyricist, composer, arranger, keyboardist and pianist.

__[Official Website](http://uru-official.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdPCarwi28K5Z7s5l2nMiLw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uru_super) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/uru.singer)__

Japanese pop singer signed under Sony Music Associated Records.

__Agency:__ Smile Company (2007-2020)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ELISA_0414) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/elisa_0414/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/elisa.smile.official)__

ＥＬＩＳＡ (エリサ) is a Japanese pop singer and model of elite model management Japan. She debuted with the single, 「 euphoric field feat. ELISA 」.  She knew the pleasure of singing by joined a choir at the age of a seventh grader then played piano from 3 years old. At the age of a ninth grader, she participated in the national choir convention. At the age of a tenth grader, she joined and played opera. Her favorite opera is “The Marriage of Figaro” of Mozart.  She applied for model audition “elite Model Look 2007” to try her possibility at the age of an eleventh grader. The 10 finalists will be elected to the National Convention.  The opera which she sang at the time of audition serves as a major debut in October of the year by an opportunity.  Her debut single is 「euphoric field feat.ELISA 」 (TV Anime “ef-a tale of memories” opening theme) records the 22nd place on ORICON chart at first appearance and a longtime seller becomes it afterwards and records an exceptional world-beater more than 30,000 pieces as a rookie.  She released 2nd single 「HIKARI 」 (TV Anime “Nabari no Ou” ending theme) in May, 2008 and strengthened presence as the singer in a contrastive ballad song with the debut at a stretch. Furthermore, She appeared in “2008 Animelo Summer Live -Challenge-” in August, 2008 and overwhelm about 18,000 people.
In September 2020, Elisa allegedly suffered sexual harassment from her manager. She has terminated her contract with Smile Company.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mizukizuiaoi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mizukizuiaoi)__

__Mizuki__ is a Japanese vocalist known to frequently collaborate with [Hiroyuki Sawano](https://anilist.co/staff/103509/Hiroyuki-Sawano) in his vocal project SawanoHiroyuki[nZk].
Norie Shimizu is a producer and advertiser.
Hidenori Taga is the founder and president of Kitty Film.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/choco_kiku) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/菊地洋子)

Married to [Eiji Suganuma](https://anilist.co/staff/109167/).

_Note: Not to be confused with [Youko Kikuchi (菊地陽子)](https://anilist.co/staff/141535/), different kanji._
Gunji Mikio is a producer, production manager and publicity manager. He is an executive at Production I.G.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹内敦志)

Affiliated with [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). Takeuchi is a renown mechanical designer and anime director, having worked on such high profile projects as [The Sky Crawlers](https://anilist.co/anime/3089/) and [Ghost in the Shell](Ghost in the Shell).

He also took part in the production of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/石川光久)

Co-founder and representative director of [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). The studio is named after him and [Takayuki Gotou](https://anilist.co/staff/103266/).

Ishikawa acted as executive producer for the anime sequence The Origin of Ren in Kill Bill, and was the producer of the first two [Ghost in the Shell](https://anilist.co/anime/43/) films. In 2005, Ishikawa joined his first joint Japanese-U.S. collaboration, since the opening of the Production I.G branch in Los Angeles, IGPX: Immortal Grand Prix, a joint production with Production I.G and Cartoon Network. Ishikawa has also produced Batman: Gotham Knight, Halo Legends and Dante's Inferno: An Animated Epic.

He also served as an executive at Bee Train from 1997 to 2006.

(Source: Wikipedia)
